channel.title: LabSim Official RSS Feed
channel.description: This is where you'll find tons of news concerning LabSim, the virtual chemistry sandbox.

item.title: LabSim 2.0.2 released
item.description: After the redesign and sidebar in LabSim 2.0, we've finally added another feature: tabbing and windowing support. The window switcher is available for free as a sidebar gadget, and does not require installation due to it being auto-installed for you. For those who wish not to use such gadget, it may be removed by pressing the gears to get to Personalisation, and then hiding the gadget "Window Switcher". Although still in progress, at this time you may access the default sandbox as well as the freshly updated Demonstrations page. The Aeonic Corporation hopes you enjoy this new feature.

item.title: LabSim may be discontinued
item.description: LabSim 1.6.1 has added a new announcement to the top stating how it may be discontinued or replaced. If the executives at Aeonic vote to make version 2.0, then we'll continue development with a new version.
